data.textUthmani: قَالَتْ لَهُمْ رُسُلُهُمْ إِن نَّحْنُ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَمُنُّ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ ۖ وَمَا كَانَ لَنَآ أَن نَّأْتِيَكُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَتْ [Said] لَهُمْ [to them] رُسُلُهُمْ [their Messengers] إِن [Not] نَّحْنُ [we (are)] إِلَّا [but] بَشَرٌۭ [a human] مِّثْلُكُمْ [like you] وَلَـٰكِنَّ [but] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] يَمُنُّ [bestows His Grace] عَلَىٰ [on] مَن [whom] يَشَآءُ [He wills] مِنْ [of] عِبَادِهِۦ ۖ [His slaves] وَمَا [And not] كَانَ [is] لَنَآ [for us] أَن [that] نَّأْتِيَكُم [we bring you] بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ [an authority] إِلَّا [except] بِإِذْنِ [by the permission of Allah] ٱللَّهِ ۚ [by the permission of Allah] وَعَلَى [And upon] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ [so let put (their) trust] ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ [the believers]
data.transliteration: Qalat lahum rusuluhum in nahnuilla basharun mithlukum walakinna Allahayamunnu AAala man yashao min AAibadihi wamakana lana an na/tiyakum bisultanin illabi-ithni Allahi waAAala Allahifalyatawakkali almu/minoon

data.textUthmani: وَمَا لَنَآ أَلَّا نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَقَدْ هَدَىٰنَا سُبُلَنَا ۚ وَلَنَصْبِرَنَّ عَلَىٰ مَآ ءَاذَيْتُمُونَا ۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
data.wordByWord: وَمَا [And what] لَنَآ [(is) for us] أَلَّا [that not] نَتَوَكَّلَ [we put our trust] عَلَى [upon] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] وَقَدْ [while certainly] هَدَىٰنَا [He has guided us] سُبُلَنَا ۚ [to our ways] وَلَنَصْبِرَنَّ [And surely we will bear with patience] عَلَىٰ [on] مَآ [what] ءَاذَيْتُمُونَا ۚ [harm you may cause us] وَعَلَى [And upon] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ [so let put (their) trust] ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ [the ones who put (their) trust]
data.transliteration: Wama lana allanatawakkala AAala Allahi waqad hadanasubulana walanasbiranna AAala ma athaytumoonawaAAala Allahi falyatawakkali almutawakkiloon

words.translation: And surely we will bear with patience

data.textUthmani: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِرُسُلِهِمْ لَنُخْرِجَنَّكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِنَآ أَوْ لَتَعُودُنَّ فِى مِلَّتِنَا ۖ فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ لَنُهْلِكَنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَقَالَ [And said] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieved] لِرُسُلِهِمْ [to their Messengers] لَنُخْرِجَنَّكُم [Surely we will drive you out] مِّنْ [of] أَرْضِنَآ [our land] أَوْ [or] لَتَعُودُنَّ [surely you should return] فِى [to] مِلَّتِنَا ۖ [our religion] فَأَوْحَىٰٓ [So inspired] إِلَيْهِمْ [to them] رَبُّهُمْ [their Lord] لَنُهْلِكَنَّ [We will surely destroy] ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ [the wrongdoers]
data.transliteration: Waqala allatheena kafaroolirusulihim lanukhrijannakum min ardina awlataAAoodunna fee millatina faawha ilayhim rabbuhumlanuhlikanna aththalimeen

words.translation: Surely we will drive you out

data.textUthmani: وَلَنُسْكِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامِى وَخَافَ وَعِيدِ
data.wordByWord: وَلَنُسْكِنَنَّكُمُ [And surely We will make you dwell] ٱلْأَرْضَ [(in) the land] مِنۢ [after them] بَعْدِهِمْ ۚ [after them] ذَٰلِكَ [That] لِمَنْ [(is) for whoever] خَافَ [fears] مَقَامِى [standing before Me] وَخَافَ [and fears] وَعِيدِ [My Threat]
data.transliteration: Walanuskinannakumu al-arda minbaAAdihim thalika liman khafa maqamee wakhafawaAAeed

words.translation: And surely We will make you dwell

data.wordByWord: وَٱسْتَفْتَحُوا۟ [And they sought victory] وَخَابَ [and disappointed] كُلُّ [every] جَبَّارٍ [tyrant] عَنِيدٍۢ [obstinate]

data.textUthmani: مِّن وَرَآئِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ وَيُسْقَىٰ مِن مَّآءٍ صَدِيدٍ
data.wordByWord: مِّن [of him] وَرَآئِهِۦ [Ahead] جَهَنَّمُ [(is) Hell] وَيُسْقَىٰ [and he will be made to drink] مِن [of] مَّآءٍۢ [water] صَدِيدٍۢ [purulent]
data.transliteration: Min wara-ihi jahannamu wayusqamin ma-in sadeed

words.translation: and he will be made to drink

data.textUthmani: يَتَجَرَّعُهُۥ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُسِيغُهُۥ وَيَأْتِيهِ ٱلْمَوْتُ مِن كُلِّ مَكَانٍ وَمَا هُوَ بِمَيِّتٍ ۖ وَمِن وَرَآئِهِۦ عَذَابٌ غَلِيظٌ
data.wordByWord: يَتَجَرَّعُهُۥ [He will sip it] وَلَا [but not] يَكَادُ [he will be near] يُسِيغُهُۥ [(to) swallowing it] وَيَأْتِيهِ [And will come to him] ٱلْمَوْتُ [the death] مِن [from] كُلِّ [every] مَكَانٍۢ [side] وَمَا [but not] هُوَ [he] بِمَيِّتٍۢ ۖ [will die] وَمِن [And ahead of him] وَرَآئِهِۦ [And ahead of him] عَذَابٌ [(is) a punishment] غَلِيظٌۭ [harsh]
data.transliteration: YatajarraAAuhu wala yakaduyuseeghuhu waya/teehi almawtu min kulli makanin wamahuwa bimayyitin wamin wara-ihi AAathabun ghaleeth

data.textUthmani: مَّثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ ۖ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ كَرَمَادٍ ٱشْتَدَّتْ بِهِ ٱلرِّيحُ فِى يَوْمٍ عَاصِفٍ ۖ لَّا يَقْدِرُونَ مِمَّا كَسَبُوا۟ عَلَىٰ شَىْءٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلضَّلَـٰلُ ٱلْبَعِيدُ
data.wordByWord: مَّثَلُ [(The) example] ٱلَّذِينَ [(of) those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieve] بِرَبِّهِمْ ۖ [in their Lord] أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ [their deeds] كَرَمَادٍ [(are) like ashes] ٱشْتَدَّتْ [blows furiously] بِهِ [on it] ٱلرِّيحُ [the wind] فِى [in] يَوْمٍ [a day] عَاصِفٍۢ ۖ [stormy] لَّا [No] يَقْدِرُونَ [control (they have)] مِمَّا [of what] كَسَبُوا۟ [they have earned] عَلَىٰ [on] شَىْءٍۢ ۚ [anything] ذَٰلِكَ [That] هُوَ [[it]] ٱلضَّلَـٰلُ [(is) the straying] ٱلْبَعِيدُ [far]
data.transliteration: Mathalu allatheena kafaroo birabbihimaAAmaluhum karamadin ishtaddat bihi arreehufee yawmin AAasifin la yaqdiroona mimmakasaboo AAala shay-in thalika huwa addalalualbaAAeed
